name: Hexabics
description:
Hexabics is a fun, unique colour matching puzzle game like no other.

Rotate colour panels across the hex playfield back into their matching position to solve each stage. With a limited number of given moves, you have to be resourceful. Plan your steps and think ahead. “No more moves left!”? Use the Undo button to optimise your moves and beat your own best score!

Once you get into the game mechanics, your mind will go into pattern solving mode. Wait for that “Aha!” moment to happen and shift your brain into an open, playful state.

*** Hexabics features ***

* Content
- 2 Game Modes: Levels and Endless (Easy, Medium, Hard)
- In level mode, 70 levels are waiting to be explored. Unlock each level to open the next
- Haptic feedback for supported devices
- 5 Colour themes (Light, Dark, Red, Blue, Contrast)
- In level mode: Undo move, Restart level, Previous and Next level buttons are available
- In endless modes: Undo move, Restart level, Randomise level is available
- Exit game will freeze the current game stage, allowing you to continue later on when you close the app and restart

* Challenging
- Can you complete all 70 levels and reach the end? We would love to hear from you!
- Strive to solve each level with a limited number of moves

* Look & Feel
- Smooth, polished touch interaction
- Interactive visual light effects
- Relaxing in-game music
- Clean graphics and animations
- No Ads

We hope you enjoy Hexabics!
